description: Mistress Hannah Hunt has been most amused by the damage she has been able to inflict with our new Terrible Toyshop implements, especially the slapper, which she now wields on Marcelo’s very sore cock and balls. The adorable yellow and pink CBT device is still firmly attached to his dick, making the pain even worse. But ultimately, Mistress Hannah goes old school with a cane and several whips. Though he’s been keeping it together for most of his adventure, Marcelo is now screaming at the top of his lungs as she continues to whip him relentlessly. Hannah stops occasionally to give him a hug and tell him he’s being a good boy. Isn’t she sweet? (Part 2 of 2)
title: So Cute! So Painful! (Part 2 of 2)
